Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Connection
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientConnection
extends Connection
This class represents the client-side endpoint of a client-server socket connection

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.network.Connection

    active, ois, oos, socket

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientConnection​(java.lang.String ipAddress, int port)
    Creates a new ClientConnection instance, setting ip address and port number of the remote server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connectToServer()
    This method initializes this clientConnection, attempting to connect to the server and then constructing the object streams on which the network events will be sent and received
    void run()
    A clientConnection continuously waits for Events from the network.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnection

      public ClientConnection​(java.lang.String ipAddress, int port)
      Creates a new ClientConnection instance, setting ip address and port number of the remote server
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - A string representing the ip address of the server
      port - The port number the server listens to

  • Method Details

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer() throws DisconnectedException
      This method initializes this clientConnection, attempting to connect to the server and then constructing the object streams on which the network events will be sent and received
      Throws:
      DisconnectedException - if this clientConnection is unable to connect to the server

    • run

      public void run()
      A clientConnection continuously waits for Events from the network. With the exception of PingEvent, which is immediately bounced back when received, any Event received is notified to this clientConnection's observers (a clientView)
